name: steam-engine
effect: Raises the user's Speed by three stages when it is hit by a Fire- or Water-type attack. The attack still deals damage.
short_effect: Boosts the Speed stat drastically when the Pokémon is hit by a Fire- or Water-type move.
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat drastically if hit by a Fire- or Water-type move.
